translation.en: GLASS [IN PAWNEE]: It's okay, son...
I know you want this to be over.
translation.fr: Je sais qu'il te tarde que ce soit fini.

translation.en: I'm right here.
I will be right here...
But, you don't give up.
You hear me?
As long as you can still grab a breath, you fight.
translation.fr: Tant que tu respires encore,tu te bats.

translation.en: You breathe... keep breathing.
GLASS [WHISPERS IN ENGLISH]: Hawk.
Ah, shit.
Goddamn sumbitches.
The sumbitch got shit for brains.
translation.fr: Il a de la merde dans la tête.

translation.en: -You seen Coulter? TRAPPER: Nope.
Listen up!
When them plews is cleaned, I want you to hoop 'em up real tight.
translation.fr: Une fois les peaux nettoyées,vous les monterez bien serré.

translation.en: Remember, we're not doing no 15-pelt bales!
translation.fr: Souvenez-vous qu'on ne fait pasde pièces de 15 peaux,

translation.en: -We're doing 30-pelt bales! HENRY: Fitzgerald!
Cap'n.
translation.fr: - Capitaine ?- Où en est le chargement ?

translation.en: Where are we with the haul? What are you thinking?
translation.fr: - Capitaine ?- Où en est le chargement ? A quoi pensez-vous ?

translation.en: I'm thinking, whatever it is they're hunting out there...
translation.fr: J'espère que ce qu'ils chassent, là-bas,

translation.en: ...I hope it don't need another shot.
Make sure we're ready to head out by dawn. Been done by this morning.
translation.fr: - Il faut être parti avant l'aube.- Ça devrait être fini.

translation.en: I'd have liked to be out by now, but the men are too tired.
translation.fr: Je préférerais être parti,mais les hommes sont fatigués.

translation.en: We're only a few days from the fort. We're trapped out.
translation.fr: Le fort n'est pas loin,mais on est à bout.

translation.en: All we have to worry about is fresh meat for the boys.
translation.fr: Il ne reste qu'à nourrir les hommes.

translation.en: Well, you, uh, seen Coulter?
JIM: Hey, we took down an elk. A big one.
translation.fr: On a eu un élan. Un grand.

translation.en: We need help to haul the meat back.
Let me know when it's on the spit. I'll help you with it then.
translation.fr: On t'aidera quand il sera sur la broche.

translation.en: Come on, I need your help.
We needed help when we were loading them bales.
translation.fr: On avait besoin d'aidepour charger les pièces.

translation.en: I been eating this damn beaver meat so long...
translation.fr: A force de manger du castordepuis si longtemps,

translation.en: ...I'm starting to miss my wife's cooking.
translation.fr: je regrette les plats de ma femme.

translation.en: -I'm starting to miss your wife. -Shut up.
translation.fr: Moi, je regrette ta femme. Ferme-la.

translation.en: COULTER: Help!
TRAPPER 1: Is that Coulter?
You go get the Captain.
TRAPPER 2: Anybody see them?
translation.fr: - Vous les voyez ?- Je vois rien.

translation.en: TRAPPER 3: Stay quiet. TRAPPER 4: Watch the ridge.
HAWK [IN PAWNEE]: What was that?
Pa?
Let's go.
[WHISPERS] They got Thomas.
I can't see 'em. I can't see 'em.
HENRY: Get down!
We're surrounded! They're everywhere!
translation.fr: Y en a partout ! Paul, à couvert !

translation.en: HENRY: Stay here! Stay here!
TRAPPER 3: Stay down!
-They want us out in the open. TRAPPER 3: Someone get him help!
translation.fr: - Ils veulent qu'on s'expose.- Allez sur la crête !

translation.en: Nobody move! Stay where you are!
translation.fr: Ne bougez pas ! Restez où vous êtes !

translation.en: They want the pelts.
We got to get on that boat right now or we'll lose it all.
translation.fr: Il faut aller au bateau,ou nous allons tout perdre.

translation.en: [IN ENGLISH] Get to the boat! To the boat, son! Move!
translation.fr: Au bateau ! Au bateau, fils ! Vite !

translation.en: Leave the furs! Leave the furs! To the boat!
Hawk!
Grab some pelts! Come on, grab the pelts!
Grab the pelts! Grab the pelts!
DAVE: Give this to my little girl.
translation.fr: Donne ça à ma petite fille.

translation.en: You're coming with us. I'll get help.
translation.fr: Tu vas venir. J'appelle à l'aide.

translation.en: GLASS: Leave the furs! Leave the pelts!
Willman!
-Lean on me. Just keep going. -Ahh!
Get to the boat!
Fucking savage!
Get on the fucking boat!
Help!
HENRY: Cut the rope! Cut the rope!
Wait for Amos!
No! We go now!
Fire the cannon!
AMOS: Don't leave! Wait!
[IN ARIKARA] My daughter, Powaqa, is not here.
translation.fr: Ma fille, Powaqa, n'est pas ici.

translation.en: Collect all the pelts we can carry.
translation.fr: Prenez le plus de peaux possible.

translation.en: We'll trade pelts with the French for horses and keep searching for her.
translation.fr: Nous les troquerons contre des chevaux,et nous reprendrons les recherches.

translation.en: HENRY: --and dust becomes flour...
...and when the morning is clear...
MAN 1: Amen. MAN 2: Amen.
HENRY: You ready?
Hold still.
ANDERSON: Where did you learn that?
My father was a doctor. Bridger!
FITZGERALD: Captain, we got a swarm of tree niggers...
translation.fr: Les Peaux-Rouges doivent attendrede finir leur travail.

translation.en: ...out here waiting to finish the job.
translation.fr: Les Peaux-Rouges doivent attendrede finir leur travail. Tenez ça.

translation.en: Tell me you got some kind of plan.
Glass?
Missouri's no good.
Not while the Ree's running it.
We got to get off this boat. Oh, you want to get off the boat?
translation.fr: - Il faut quitter le bateau.- Quitter le bateau ?

translation.en: Then what do we do, huh?
Take our furs and sit out there amongst the Ree like a bunch of ducks?
translation.fr: On prend les peaux,et on va se faire cueillir par les Aris ?

translation.en: Only safe thing to do is track a new course back up on land.
translation.fr: On n'en réchapperaqu'en continuant à pied.

translation.en: That'll add weeks to the trip.
Better than floating where they can get eyes on us.
translation.fr: C'est ça ou s'exposer en aval.

translation.en: They got eyes on you right now, son.
What I'm saying is we stay on the boat.
Chart a course toward the fort and take our chances on the water.
translation.fr: Tracer un itinéraire,et se risquer sur la rivière.

translation.en: Glass knows this territory best. It's his job to get us home safe.
translation.fr: Glass connaît mieux la régionque nous tous réunis. - Son travail est de nous ramener.- Quoi ?

translation.en: -Get us home safe? -Yeah.
translation.fr: - Son travail est de nous ramener.- Quoi ?

translation.en: FITZGERALD: Need I remind you we already lost 32 men?
It's 33 now. They were my men, Fitzgerald. I know how many I lost.
translation.fr: 33. Je sais combien de mes hommesj'ai perdus.

translation.en: We do like Glass says. That's the end of it.
GLASS: We have to set the boat loose.
If the Ree are tracking us, they'll find it downriver.
translation.fr: Les Aris le trouveront en aval.

translation.en: Best course is to hike inland to the Grand and follow it to Fort Kiowa.
translation.fr: Suivons la Grand River par la rivejusqu'à Fort Kiowa.

translation.en: On foot? It'll be winter before we get there.
translation.fr: - A pied ?- Je ne comprends pas. On arrivera en hiver.

translation.en: Yeah, unless we come across a post, trade for some horses.
translation.fr: On troquera des mules à un comptoir.

translation.en: Ain't no posts that far over!
translation.fr: Un comptoir, si loin de tout ?

translation.en: Captain, losing this boat is a goddamn mistake.
translation.fr: Capitaine, laisser ce bateauest une grosse erreur.

translation.en: The Ree ain't that stupid.
translation.fr: Les Aris sont pas si cons.

translation.en: We keep it, we can lay it up around Arrow's Peak.
Quit acting like you know what you're talking about.
translation.fr: Tu sais pas de quoi tu parles.

translation.en: Ain't nobody talking to you.
Who'd listen to you anyway?
Can't find your way out of your breeches to take a shit.
translation.fr: Tu trouves même pas ton culquand tu veux chier.

translation.en: All I'm saying is Camp Rhulen is just up the way.
translation.fr: Ce que je dis,c'est que Camp Rhulen est pas loin.

translation.en: We can hole up there.
We walk.
Yeah, I'm sure we will.
Wish my dad was a doctor. Then he could've bought me a captain's job.
translation.fr: Si j'étais fils de docteur, je me paierais un grade de capitaine.

translation.en: What do we do, eh?
Pray these pelts ain't rotten if we ever get back here?
translation.fr: On prie pour que les peauxpourrissent pas ?

translation.en: HENRY: Make sure to mark this place. We're leaving a fortune under these rocks.
translation.fr: Laissez des repères. On laisse une vraie fortune. Va cacher ça plus loin.

translation.en: Glass, chart a course.
Tightest you can that gets us around the Ree.
translation.fr: Le plus court chemin sans Arikaras.

translation.en: Yes, sir.
FITZGERALD: This ain't right.
We all know these furs ain't gonna be here by the time we come back.
translation.fr: Ça va pas du tout. Les peaux seront plus làquand on reviendra.

translation.en: There's no way we can haul them all the way to the fort.
translation.fr: On ne peut pas les porter jusqu'au fort. Pas comme ça. Et les Aris sont partout.Il faut avoir les mains libres.

translation.en: Arikara are all through the territory. We'll want our hands free.
translation.fr: Pas comme ça. Et les Aris sont partout.Il faut avoir les mains libres.

translation.en: We're gonna lose those pelts.
-You rather keep the pelts or your life? -Life?
translation.fr: - Vous préférez perdre la vie ?- La vie ?

translation.en: What life you talking about? I ain't got no life.
translation.fr: Quelle vie ? J'ai pas de vie.

translation.en: I just got living and the only way I get that is through these pelts.
translation.fr: Je survis, c'est tout,et c'est grâce à ces peaux.

translation.en: Fuck!
Ain't no way I'm going home after six months working my ass off like a mule...
translation.fr: Pas question. Rentrer après six moisà trimer comme une mule,

translation.en: ...risking my neck, men dying, and for what?
translation.fr: à risquer ma vie, et tout ça pour quoi ?

translation.en: Damn near lost everything. Job's been fucked from the start!
translation.fr: J'ai presque tout perdu. C'était foireux dès le départ.

translation.en: There's the one been fucking us.
You wonder how the Ree got the dead drop on us...
translation.fr: Comment les Arisont pu nous tomber dessus

translation.en: ...when Mr. Glass was supposed to look out for that very thing?
translation.fr: alors que M. Glassdevait justement éviter ça ?

translation.en: All them Pawnee buddies of his.
Pawnee's as much against the Ree as the rest of us.
translation.fr: Les Pawnees sont aussiles ennemis des Aris.

translation.en: Well, what about his little half-breed son?
translation.fr: Et son petit sang-mêlé de fils...

translation.en: What kind of savage you think his mama was?
translation.fr: Sa mère, c'était pas une sauvage ?

translation.en: Oh, lay off the boy, Fitz.
All I'm saying is...
...a savage is savage.
translation.fr: c'est qu'un sauvage, c'est un sauvage.

translation.en: Hey, Glass...
...is it true what they say... ...about you shooting a lieutenant while living with them savages?
translation.fr: C'est vrai que t'as tué un lieutenantquand t'étais chez les sauvages ?

translation.en: HENRY: Fitzgerald.
FITZGERALD: Twenty-one dead soldiers and 40 dead feathernecks.
But you and your boy the only ones to walk out alive.
translation.fr: et vous êtes les seuls survivants ?

translation.en: Kind of a miracle.
HENRY: Shut up, Fitzgerald.
FITZGERALD: Is that what you did? Shot one of your own to save this little dog here?
translation.fr: Alors, c'est vrai ?T'as tué un des tiens pour ce chien ?

translation.en: Shut up!
Why? Was he playing with this little boy's mama, huh?
HENRY: Fitzgerald! -Did he kill her?
Hey, you can quit polishing that rifle when I'm talking to you.
translation.fr: Arrête d'astiquer ton fusilpendant que je parle.

translation.en: I'm working on it.
You can work on it when I'm done talking to you.
translation.fr: Tu feras çaquand j'aurai fini de parler.

translation.en: Look at me. HENRY: That's enough!
You're forgetting your place, boy.
translation.fr: Tu oublies quelle est ta place.

translation.en: As far as I can tell, my place is here on the smart end of this rifle.
translation.fr: Je crois que ma placeest du bon côté de ce fusil.

translation.en: HENRY: You move along, Fitzgerald.
That's an order!
Listen! There's only a couple hours of light left.
translation.fr: C'est un ordre ! Il fera bientôt nuit.

translation.en: We got to stash these pelts and get rid of the boat.
translation.fr: Cachons les peauxet laissons le bateau. Allez !

translation.en: -Let's go! MAN: Yes, captain.
[IN PAWNEE] I told you to be invisible, son.
At least he...
--If you want to survive, keep your mouth shut.
translation.fr: Si tu veux vivre, ferme ta bouche.

translation.en: - At least he hear me... - They don't hear your voice!
translation.fr: - Il m'a entendu.- Ils ne t'entendent pas ! Ils ne voient que la couleur de ta peau.

translation.en: They just see the color of your face.
translation.fr: Ils ne voient que la couleur de ta peau.

translation.en: You understand?
Yes.
You have to listen to me, son.
You have to listen.
HENRY: Beckett!
Weston!
JONES: Why are they not jumping?
STUBBY BILL: It looks like they changed their minds.
translation.fr: Faut croire qu'ils ont changé d'avis.

translation.en: FITZGERALD: Smart sumbitches.
Smart.
I ought to be on that boat.
They did the right thing.
GLASS: It's time to move.
Get up.
We're headed out.
I'm coming.
It's better you lay down.
When the rest of the men are ready you send them to me.
I'm going west.
You are my son.
WARRIOR 1 [IN ARIKARA]: There are only two here.
ELK DOG [IN ARIKARA]: Powaqa is not here.
WARRIOR 1: The others probably took her.
They went north.
translation.fr: Ils sont partis vers le nord.

translation.en: ELK DOG: We'll pick up their tracks on the mountain.
translation.fr: Nous retrouverons leur tracedans la montagne.

translation.en: HENRY: Was it the right decision? Leaving the boat?
[IN ENGLISH] The Ree own that river. They would've flanked us.
translation.fr: Les Aris contrôlent la rivière.Ils nous auraient pris en tenailles.

translation.en: We stay east of the Grand through the mountains... ...we cut a week off our trip.
translation.fr: En traversant les montagnes, à l'est,on gagnera une semaine.

translation.en: Lands are bone dry up there. Nothing for the Ree to hunt.
translation.fr: Les Aris ne trouveront pas de gibierlà-haut.

translation.en: HENRY: Except us.
GLASS: Except us.
Is it true what Fitzgerald said?
translation.fr: C'est vrai, ce que Fitz a dit ?

translation.en: Is that why you came out here to the edge of the world?
translation.fr: C'est ce qui vous a conduit ici,loin de tout ?

translation.en: I do like the quiet.
Your boy...
...he's seen a lot.
translation.fr: il a vécu bien des choses.

translation.en: He got a mother you need to get him back to?
translation.fr: Il a une mère qui l'attend quelque part ?

translation.en: There are cubs here!
translation.fr: Il y a des oursons, là !

translation.en: Christ Almighty.
He's down here!
ANDERSON: Keep your eyes open. There's bears around.
JIM: I need your help now!
Get me rags now!
Give me rags before he bleeds out. Rags.
translation.fr: Vite, avant qu'il se vide son sang.

translation.en: Prepare the kit. Bridger! You hold that.
translation.fr: Préparez ma trousse. Bridger, tenez ça.

translation.en: Easy. Oh, my God.
ANDERSON: Got to give him credit for taking that grizz down with him.
translation.fr: Il a du mérite d'avoir tué ce grizzly.

translation.en: He shouldn't have shot. The place is crawling with tree niggers.
translation.fr: Il aurait pas dû tirer.Ça grouille de nègres à plumes.

translation.en: HENRY: That's enough! That's enough! We're still in Ree territory.
translation.fr: Ça suffit ! On est toujours en territoire arikara.C'est l'un des nôtres !

translation.en: He's one of our own men.
translation.fr: On est toujours en territoire arikara.C'est l'un des nôtres !

translation.en: Scout a circle around us. North and west. Take those two with you.
translation.fr: Inspectez le nord et l'ouestavec ces deux-là.

translation.en: Bill, Fryman, you take south and east.
translation.fr: Bill et Fryman, le sud et l'est.

translation.en: Watch for anyone that might've heard that shot.
translation.fr: Trouvez quiconque a pu entendrela détonation.

translation.en: We have to stitch him up.
[IN ENGLISH] What about me? Captain?
You just stay here.
Hold it down.
JIM: I'm so sorry, Mr. Glass. HENRY: Bridger, press down here.
translation.fr: Je suis navré, M. Glass. Bridger, tenez-le. Appuyez bien.

translation.en: JIM: He's bleeding down here, too.
ANDERSON: They're torturing the bastard.
The proper thing to do would be to finish him off quick.
translation.fr: Le plus charitable serait de l'achever rapidement.

translation.en: Unless he has a chance of pulling through.
Pulling through?
You saw what that grizz did to him.
translation.fr: Tu as vu ce que le grizzly lui a fait ?

translation.en: -He'll be dead inside an hour. -Mm-hm.
translation.fr: Dans une heure, il est mort.

translation.en: Yeah, we all will be if he don't quit wailing like that.
translation.fr: Et nous aussi, s'il continue à brailler.

translation.en: Toward you and twist it into place. I'll hold him. Go.
translation.fr: Tirez vers vous et remettez-la en place.Je le tiens.

translation.en: -Pa. HENRY: Hold him. Go.
Go!
Now!
He passed out.
I'll take advantage and stitch up his neck.
translation.fr: C'est le moment de lui coudre le cou.Montre.

translation.en: Water.
Bridger, tell the others we'll camp here tonight.
translation.fr: Bridger, nous camperons ici cette nuit.

translation.en: [IN PAWNEE] I'm right here.
I'll be right here...
INTERPRETER [IN ARIKARA]: We can't give you any horses.
translation.fr: On ne peut pas vous donner des chevaux.

translation.en: [IN ARIKARA] We'll take these three horses.
[IN FRENCH] You stand there and talk to me about honor?
translation.fr: Vous vous tenez làet me parlez d'honneur ? D'honneur ?

translation.en: Two white men snuck into our village, and took my daughter, Powaqa.
translation.fr: Deux Blancs se sont glissésdans notre village et ont emmené ma fille, Powaqa.

translation.en: HENRY: I want everybody up at the crack of dawn.
translation.fr: - Je veux que vous soyez levés à l'aube.- Oui, capitaine.

translation.en: Carrying Glass will be hard, so we need to get ahead as far as possible.
translation.fr: Porter Glass sera une épreuve. Il faut prendrele plus d'avance possible.

translation.en: We'll divide into two groups.
Fitzgerald, Jones, Fryman, you take the east side of the river.
translation.fr: Fitzgerald, Jones et Frymanà l'est de la rivière.

translation.en: Anderson, you scout up front.
That claw don't belong to you.
translation.fr: Ces griffes sont pas à toi.

translation.en: It ain't for me.
HENRY: Don't let him down! Don't let him down!
ANDERSON: Watch it.
JONES: How we gonna make it up this? FITZGERALD: Slow down.
translation.fr: - Comment on va escalader ça ?- En allant moins vite.

translation.en: ANDERSON: It's killing us, captain!
HENRY: Lift it, Bridger!
FITZGERALD: Goddamn it, keep it steady.
JIM: Lift it up higher. HAWK [IN ENGLISH]: I am.
translation.fr: - Soulève.- C'est ce que je fais.

translation.en: HENRY: And heave!
JONES: I'll go up and pull.
My foot!
Enough of this shit!
We'll never make it across like this, captain.
He's burning up.
Cap'n, you ain't doing us nor him no favors...
translation.fr: Capitaine, vous ne rendez serviceni à nous ni à lui

translation.en: ...by letting him go on suffering like this.
Captain, it's all the same up here.
We're gonna have to go back. Find another way.
translation.fr: Il faut redescendre. Trouver un autre passage.

translation.en: Glass. Hugh.
I'm sorry. I'm sorry.
Lay that rag over his eyes, Mr. Bridger.
HAWK: What?
HENRY: Lay the rag over his eyes. HAWK: Wait!
HENRY: I'm sorry, Hugh.
JIM: Sir, I can't do that.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas faire ça.

translation.en: HAWK: How do we get back without him? Only he knows the way.
translation.fr: Comment on va rentrer ?Lui seul connaît le chemin.

translation.en: HENRY: Lay the rag over his eyes. JIM: I can't.
translation.fr: - Bandez-lui les yeux.- Je ne peux pas.

translation.en: HENRY: Lay it over his eyes!
Step back.
HAWK [IN ENGLISH]: Bridger, stop! Bridger, Henry. Henry! Henry, please.
translation.fr: Pense à nos femmes. Henry, je vous en prie.

translation.en: There's a $70 bonus from the Rocky Mountain Fur Company to the two men...
translation.fr: 70 $ offertspar la Rocky Mountain Fur Company aux deux hommesqui veilleront sur Glass jusqu'à la fin.

translation.en: ...that stay with Glass to see this through.
translation.fr: aux deux hommesqui veilleront sur Glass jusqu'à la fin.

translation.en: HAWK [IN ENGLISH]: I'll stay!
Me too. Money or not, I'll stay.
translation.fr: Moi aussi. Argent ou pas, je reste.

translation.en: I'll need a third.
Sorry, captain.
I have a family. I'm not crazy.
translation.fr: - Navré, capitaine.- J'ai une famille. Et je suis pas fou.

translation.en: Captain, three men can't hold off a party of Ree... ...much less some boys.
translation.fr: Trois hommes, c'est rien, face aux Aris,et des gamins encore moins.

translation.en: Besides, $70 ain't gonna buy nobody a new set of ears.
translation.fr: Et 70 $, ça remplace pasune paire d'oreilles.

translation.en: A hundred, then.
This man is the only reason we're still alive.
translation.fr: Nous devons nos vies à cet homme.

translation.en: We were 45 men when this started. Now we're ten. Almost nine.
translation.fr: On était 45, au départ.Maintenant, on est 10. Pour pas dire neuf.

translation.en: HAWK: He's my father. He can have my share.
translation.fr: C'est mon père. Je donne ma part.

translation.en: JIM: Mine too. He can have my share also.
translation.fr: Moi aussi, je cède ma part.

translation.en: All right.
If Mr. Bridger feels the same way, I'll lag behind with them.
translation.fr: Si M. Bridger fait pareil,je reste avec eux.

translation.en: -You? -Yep.
You already lost my share of the pelts...
translation.fr: Vous m'avez fait perdre les peaux.

translation.en: ...so I got no choice but to make it up by some other means.
Sticking around for another day or two don't make no difference.
translation.fr: Rester un ou deux jours de plusne changera rien.

translation.en: $300, at least I get to go home with something.
Glass is to be cared for until, understood?
translation.fr: Vous veillerez sur Glassjusqu'à la fin, compris ?

translation.en: Yeah. You have my word. I understand.
HENRY: You boys get him down off this slope... ...and somewhere safe before dark.
translation.fr: Descendez le mettre à l'abriavant la nuit.

translation.en: -Fitzgerald. FITZGERALD: Captain.
Glass is to be cared for as long as necessary.
translation.fr: Vous veillerez sur luile temps qu'il faudra.

translation.en: And a proper burial when it's time.
He's earned it.
I understand.
You hurt yourself?
ANDERSON: I'll be fine.
HAWK [IN PAWNEE]: Can you hear that wind, father?
Remember what mother used to say about the wind?
translation.fr: Tu te rappelles ce que mère disait ?

translation.en: The wind cannot defeat a tree with strong roots.
translation.fr: Le vent ne peut riencontre un arbre aux racines solides.

translation.en: You are still breathing...
I miss her so much.
GLASS [IN PAWNEE]: I will be right here...
I'm right here.
As long as you can still grab a breath, you fight.
translation.fr: Tant que tu respires, tu te bats.

translation.en: You breathe. Keep breathing.
WIFE [IN PAWNEE]: When there is a storm...
And you stand in front of a tree...
translation.fr: si tu te tiens au pied d'un arbre...

translation.en: If you look at the branches, you swear it will fall.
translation.fr: en regardant ses branches,tu jurerais qu'il va tomber.

translation.en: But if you watch the trunk, you will see its stability.
translation.fr: Mais si tu regardes le tronc, tu vois sa stabilité.

translation.en: FITZGERALD: Three hundred bucks goes a long way toward retirement.
translation.fr: 300 $, ça fera du bienle jour de la retraite.

translation.en: Go down to Texas, find me a decent piece of land, and start pissing in the wind.
translation.fr: Je m'achèterai un lopin de terreau Texas, et je coincerai la bulle.

translation.en: Get me the hell out of this godforsaken place.
translation.fr: Et je retournerai plus dans cet enfer.

translation.en: JIM: Ree done that to you?
translation.fr: Les Aris vous ont fait ça ?

translation.en: I'm just asking.
Yeah, they done it.
They took their sweet time with it.
translation.fr: Et ils ont pris leur temps.

translation.en: At the start, I didn't feel nothing. I just heard the sound...
translation.fr: Au début, j'ai rien senti. J'entendais seulementle poignard me gratter le crâne,

translation.en: ...of the knife scraping against my skull...
translation.fr: J'entendais seulementle poignard me gratter le crâne,

translation.en: ...and them all laughing and whooping and hollering and whatnot.
Then the blood came.
It was cold. It started streaming down my face, in my eyes...
translation.fr: Ça me pissait sur la figure,dans les yeux...

translation.en: ...and breathing it in.
translation.fr: ça me rentrait dans le nez.

translation.en: Choking on it.
That's when I felt it.
Yeah, felt all of it.
I got my head turned inside out.
JIM: Jesus.
Them Indians down Texas way...
...they may rob you, but they ain't gonna take your topknot.
translation.fr: c'est des voleurs,mais ils te scalpent pas.

translation.en: JIM: When was it?
Goddamn it, will you quit that noise now, will you?
translation.fr: Bon Dieu, tu vas arrêterde faire ce bruit ?

translation.en: Quit it.
FITZGERALD: I'm falling further back... ...from Henry and the boys on account of tending to you.
translation.fr: Je m'éloigne de Henry et des autresà cause de toi.

translation.en: Got to get up the damn mountain, but winter keeps chasing us down.
translation.fr: Faut passer les montagnes,mais l'hiver nous laisse pas faire.

translation.en: If you ready to take the sacrament...
translation.fr: Si t'es prêt à recevoir les sacrements,

translation.en: ...I can do that for you.
What you holding to, Glass?
You know...
...it would be better... ...if you were to take that last breath of yours now...
...for all of us.
Now you hung tough.
And that's something.
I'm begging you.
Them Ree are so close I can smell 'em. You can smell 'em too.
translation.fr: Les Aris nous talonnent, je les sens. Et tu les sens aussi.

translation.en: You got to think of your boy. All right? 'Cause you're gonna kill him.
translation.fr: Pense à ton gamin. Tu vas le tuer.

translation.en: You'll kill us all.
translation.fr: Tu vas tous nous tuer. Je n'ai pas voulu ça.

translation.en: I can muzzle you if you like.
Take away this suffering quick and easy. No one ever has to know that you give up.
translation.fr: J'abrège tes souffrances.Je dirai pas que t'as renoncé. Je peux le faire.

translation.en: All you have to do is blink if you want me to do that.
translation.fr: Cligne des yeux, et je te le fais.

translation.en: Save your boy and blink.
translation.fr: Sauve ton gamin, cligne des yeux.

translation.en: You just have to blink.
Yeah. There it is.
You'd best hope the good Lord'll get His ass here quick, huh?
translation.fr: Pourvu que le Seigneurramène son cul en vitesse, hein ?

translation.en: Maybe He'll forgive your sins, maybe not.
Thus I do commend thee to the Lord.
translation.fr: Je recommande ainsi ton âme à Dieu.

translation.en: Through Jesus Christ the Lord of all reality and mercy...
translation.fr: Au nom de Jésus Christ,seigneur du réel et miséricordieux,

translation.en: ...and the Father and the Creator, I hold thee--
translation.fr: et du Père, et du créateur,

translation.en: HAWK [IN ENGLISH] Get away! Get away!
You okay? Jim! Jim! Help!
HAWK: Help! -Calm down. Jim! Help!
Don't shout! You're gonna get us all killed!
translation.fr: Ne crie pas,tu vas tous nous faire tuer.

translation.en: Keep away! I'll tell the captain what you did. They'll hang you!
translation.fr: Je le dirai aux autres.Vous serez pendu !

translation.en: -They'll hang you! Jim, help! -We have an understanding.
translation.fr: - Il est d'accord.- Vous serez pendu ! - Jim, par ici !- Il est prêt.

translation.en: What's fucking wrong with you people?
Shit.
JIM: I got one beaver, Hawk.
Breathing changed?
I hadn't noticed.
Damn, he's cold as ice.
Here you go, Mr. Glass. This will help you. Keep you warm.
translation.fr: Tenez, M. Glass. Ça vous fera du bien.Ça vous réchauffera.

translation.en: It's all right.
Where's Hawk?
He ain't with you?
I understand, Mr. Glass.
It's all right. I think I'll get a fire going.
FITZGERALD: Yeah. Sounds like a good idea.
FITZGERALD [WHISPERING]: Shh. Ree.
There's about 20 of them down by the creek.
translation.fr: Une vingtaine, près de la crique.

translation.en: They're headed this way. Grab your shit and let's go.
translation.fr: Ils viennent par ici. Prends tes affaires, et partons.

translation.en: Shit. What do we do?
FITZGERALD: Run, right now.
translation.fr: On fout le camp, et vite.

translation.en: -What about Hawk? -He ain't our problem no more.
translation.fr: - Et Hawk ?- C'est plus notre problème.

translation.en: We can't just leave him.
translation.fr: - On peut pas le laisser.- Ils l'ont étripé ou scalpé.

translation.en: Either he's gutted or scalped. And if he ain't he can find us, can't he?
translation.fr: - On peut pas le laisser.- Ils l'ont étripé ou scalpé. Sinon, il nous retrouvera.

translation.en: What about Glass?
He ain't our problem. Like us, he's on his own.
translation.fr: Plus notre problème. Il est seul.

translation.en: We made a promise to the captain. A proper burial when the time was needed.
He needs that rifle!
translation.fr: Il a besoin de ce fusil !

translation.en: He couldn't do nothing with it if you tarred it to his hand.
translation.fr: Il en fera rien, de toute manière. Prends tes affaires, et filons.

translation.en: We can't do this.
We got no fucking choice.
JIM: No, we can't. Look at him.
All right, shit, then, buddy. Get him up. You want to take him?
translation.fr: Et puis merde ! Mets-le debout. Tu veux l'emmener ? Allons-y.

translation.en: JIM: Easy. Slowly, Fitz. Easy with him.
FITZGERALD: Just get your shit. Get your shit!
Shut up.
Shut up!
JIM: Hold up!
Fitz. What are you doing?
What does it look like? Proper burial. Like you wanted.
translation.fr: - Que faites-vous ?- A ton avis ? Je l'enterre, comme tu voulais.

translation.en: JIM: No, not like this.
FITZGERALD: Why not?
He's alive, Fitz. He's alive.
So shoot him.
I have to go. I have to go.
I'm sorry, Mr. Glass. I'm sorry.
MURPHY: Captain! This way!
There's a path down here!
ANDERSON: There ain't shit down there! We got to climb over!
translation.fr: Il y a rien en bas. Il faut monter.

translation.en: JONES: Glass said to stay east! ANDERSON: Glass can go to hell!
translation.fr: - Glass a dit d'aller vers l'est.- Qu'il aille au diable.

translation.en: HENRY: What's the map say?
translation.fr: - Que dit la carte ?- Il faut monter.

translation.en: Keep climbing. We climb, Captain. We keep climbing.
Till we reach Old Gabe.
We climb.
We got to wait for Murph. ANDERSON: Yeah. You wait for him.
translation.fr: - Il faut attendre Murphy.- Toi, attends-le.

translation.en: Captain?
Sir...
translation.fr: Murphy dit qu'il y a un passage, en bas.

translation.en: ...Murphy says there's a way down there. Who we following?
translation.fr: Murphy dit qu'il y a un passage, en bas. - On suit qui ?- Suis qui tu veux.

translation.en: ANDERSON: You follow who you want! I'm going up!
translation.fr: - On suit qui ?- Suis qui tu veux. Moi, je monte. Traversez !

translation.en: Stubby, keep going up!
JONES: Murph! Come here!
[IN PAWNEE] I'm not leaving you, son.
translation.fr: Je ne te laisserai pas, fils.

translation.en: I'm right here.
FITZGERALD: Fire's done.
I can't even feel my feet.
Didn't we put enough distance between us and them Ree?
translation.fr: On n'a pas assez distancé les Aris ?

translation.en: A dozen Ree can make twice as good time as we can.
translation.fr: Même à dix, ils vont deux fois plus vite.

translation.en: -Twenty. -What?
You said you saw twenty Ree.
translation.fr: Vous avez dit en avoir vu 20.

translation.en: Yeah? What you talking about?
-You woke me up. -Mm-hm.
You said you saw twenty Ree by the creek.
translation.fr: en disant en avoir vu 20près de la crique.

translation.en: Well, yeah, twenty, a dozen...
translation.fr: 20 ou une dizaine, ça change rien.

translation.en: ...it don't matter. I wasn't gonna hang around counting fucking feathers.
translation.fr: 20 ou une dizaine, ça change rien. J'allais pas rester làà compter les plumes.

translation.en: As a matter of fact...
...what was you doing down by the creek all by yourself?
translation.fr: pourquoi vous étiez tout seulprès de la crique ?

translation.en: I'd already brought up plenty of water.
Answer me, Fitzgerald. I asked you a question.
translation.fr: Répondez. Je vous ai posé une question.

translation.en: Don't question me on account of you feel guilty.
translation.fr: Tu dis ça parce que t'as des remords.

translation.en: Answer me or I'll blow your head off.
You got a short memory, boy.
Your ass would be floating around the Missouri right now... ...if it wasn't for me.
translation.fr: Sans moi, en ce moment,tu flotterais dans la rivière.

translation.en: You want to ask questions?
What you want to ask? If you want to know, ask it.
You want to know why you left Mr. Glass back there for dead, huh?
translation.fr: Tu veux savoir pourquoitu as laissé Glass pour mort ?

translation.en: Or why you left your little boyfriend running around?
You want to know if he's still alive?
translation.fr: Tu veux savoir s'il est vivant ?

translation.en: I'll tell you why. It's 'cause you ain't a man yet.
translation.fr: Je vais te dire. T'es pas un homme.

translation.en: It's 'cause you was scared shitless. You're scared now.
translation.fr: Je vais te dire. T'es pas un homme. T'avais peur, comme maintenant.Pose ce fusil.

translation.en: The Ree.
What of them?
Tell me, did you see 'em?
-Put your rifle down. -Did you see the Ree?
translation.fr: - Pose ce fusil.- Vous les avez vus ?

translation.en: Not a single one.
translation.fr: J'en ai pas vu un seul.

translation.en: You fucking lied to me? You lied to me!
translation.fr: Vous m'avez menti. Vous m'avez menti !

translation.en: I had to scare some sense into you, boy.
translation.fr: Tu m'as écoutéparce que je t'ai fait peur.

translation.en: Glass was dead. Hawk we don't know about.
translation.fr: Glass était mort. Hawk, on sait pas.

translation.en: No point in either of us dying either, you understand?
translation.fr: Ça aurait servi à rienqu'on meure aussi.

translation.en: The way I see it, I saved your life twice now. I ought to be God to you.
translation.fr: Je t'ai déjà sauvé deux fois. Je devrais être Dieu pour toi.

translation.en: And God giveth and God taketh away.
translation.fr: Ce que Dieu donne, Dieu le reprend.

translation.en: Lucky fucker.
Next time you want to shoot somebody...
translation.fr: Quand tu veux tuer quelqu'un, essaie...

translation.en: ...you might want to use powder, prime your rifle.
translation.fr: de mettre de la poudre. Il faut amorcer.

translation.en: Come on. Let's git. Grab your shit.
Fresh blood. This could be Powaqa.
translation.fr: Du sang frais.Peut-être celui de Powaqa.

translation.en: [IN ARIKARA] A dead boy.
[IN ARIKARA] A Pawnee boy.
Let's go.
Who did this? FITZGERALD: I don't know.
translation.fr: - Qui a fait ça ?- Je sais pas.

translation.en: Could be Captain Leavenworth's boys.
Put some eyes on the back of your head.
translation.fr: Mets un œil derrière ta tête.

translation.en: These Injuns ain't never as dead as you think they are.
translation.fr: Les Indiens sont jamaisaussi morts qu'on le croit.

translation.en: Look at 'em, huh? They're always stealing our shit.
translation.fr: Regarde ça.Toujours à nous voler nos affaires.

translation.en: FITZGERALD: We got horses over here!
translation.fr: Il y a des chevaux par ici.

translation.en: We got horses!
JIM: What you want to do about these pigs?
FITZGERALD: The Lord's on our side, kid.
translation.fr: Le Seigneur est dans notre camp.

translation.en: FITZGERALD: You all right there, kid?
Your head in the right place?
I guess.
I can't help thinking about whether we did the right--
translation.fr: - Je me demande si on a...- Arrête.

translation.en: Ain't our place to wonder. The good Lord...
translation.fr: Faut pas se poser de questions.

translation.en: ...got us on a road whether we choose it or not.
translation.fr: Le Seigneur nous montre la voie,qu'on le veuille ou non.

translation.en: My pop, he weren't a religious man, you know?
translation.fr: Mon père, il était pas religieux.

translation.en: If you couldn't grow it, kill it, or eat it, he just plain old didn't believe in it.
translation.fr: Ce qu'il pouvait pas planter,tuer ou manger, il y croyait pas.

translation.en: And this one time he head on up the old Saba hills. San Saba hills?
translation.fr: Une fois, il étaitdans les collines de Saba. San Saba, tu sais ?

translation.en: He joined a couple Texas Ranger buddies of his to hunt.
translation.fr: Il allait chasseravec ses copains Texas Rangers.

translation.en: Pretty routine. He done it like a hundred times before.
translation.fr: Il avait déjà fait ça cent fois.

translation.en: Should have been a 3-day kill, but on the second day...
translation.fr: Ils devaient partir trois jours, mais le deuxième jour,tout a commencé à foirer.

translation.en: ...it all went fucked.
translation.fr: mais le deuxième jour,tout a commencé à foirer.

translation.en: Somehow that night he lost his buddies.
translation.fr: Je sais pas comment,il a perdu les autres.

translation.en: And to top it off...
...them Comanches went and took the horses.
translation.fr: les Comanches lui ont volé ses chevaux.

translation.en: So he was starving and delirious...
translation.fr: Il était affamé, à moitié fou.

translation.en: ...and he crawls up into this mott...
translation.fr: Il a rampé dans un boqueteau,

translation.en: ...this group of trees out in the middle of nowhere...
translation.fr: une touffe d'arbres, sans rien autour,

translation.en: ...just sticking up in this ocean of scrub...
...and he found religion.
translation.fr: et il a trouvé la foi.

translation.en: At that moment, he told me...
translation.fr: A ce moment-là, il m'a dit,

translation.en: ...he found God.
And it turns out that God....
He's a squirrel.
Yeah. A big, old meaty one.
"I found God," he used to say.
"And while sitting there and basking in the glory and sublimity of mercy...
translation.fr: "Et tout en me vautrant "dans sa gloireet sa sublime miséricorde,

translation.en: ...I shot and ate that son of a bitch."
translation.fr: "je l'ai tiré et je l'ai bouffé,ce salopard".

translation.en: Yeah. You might want to close your eyes, kid.
[IN PAWNEE] I'm injured.
[IN PAWNEE] What happened to you?
A bear.
[IN PAWNEE] My men... left me for dead.
translation.fr: Mes hommes m'ont laissé pour mort.

translation.en: Killed my son.
I lost my family too.
translation.fr: Moi aussi, j'ai perdu ma famille.

translation.en: Sioux killed my people.
translation.fr: Les Sioux ont tué les miens.

translation.en: I'm going south to find more Pawnee.
translation.fr: Je vais vers le sudretrouver d'autres Pawnees.

translation.en: My heart bleeds...
But revenge is in the creator's hands.
translation.fr: Mais la vengeance appartient au créateur.

translation.en: You will ride with me...
HIKUC: Your body is rotten.
Need to heal.
You could die.
FITZGERALD: Yeah! There she is.
We did it.
You ought to be proud of yourself, boy.
translation.fr: Tu peux être fier de toi.

translation.en: We followed orders. We just skipped the funeral part.
translation.fr: On a suivi les consignes.Sauf pour l'enterrement.

translation.en: Don't go down there and start growing no conscience.
translation.fr: Alors va pas commencerà te faire des cas de conscience,

translation.en: 'Cause sure as night'll come they'll have us swinging from a couple ropes.
translation.fr: parce que c'est sûrqu'on finirait au bout d'une corde.

translation.en: We did what we had to do.
translation.fr: On a fait ce qu'on avait à faire.

translation.en: FITZGERALD: We had the extra day so we managed to dig...
translation.fr: On avait la journée,alors on a creusé

translation.en: ...a little deeper, lay rocks on top so scavengers couldn't get at him.
translation.fr: et on a couvert de pierrescontre les charognards.

translation.en: It was done right and all. He was buried right.
translation.fr: On a fait ça dans les règles.Un vrai enterrement.

translation.en: -Sir, can we-- -The truth is that...
...ahem, when Hawk disappeared, I was worried about savages.
translation.fr: - Monsieur, on peut...- En vérité, quand Hawk a disparu,j'ai eu peur des sauvages.

translation.en: And I was ready to get, to move on out.
translation.fr: Je voulais partir, reprendre la route.

translation.en: Yeah, but Bridger here argued to stay.
He argued to stay...
...so he could at least build a cross or something...
...to put on top of Glass's grave, and that's what he did. That's what we did.
translation.fr: et la planter sur la tombe. Et il l'a fait. On l'a fait.

translation.en: I'm glad you pulled your weight, Mr. Bridger.
translation.fr: Bravo, Bridger.Vous avez fait votre part.

translation.en: He more than pulled his weight, captain. This man here, he was my partner.
translation.fr: Il a fait plus que ça.Ce monsieur m'a bien secondé.

translation.en: Am I to assume that the agreed arrangement did not change?
translation.fr: Je présume que nos accordsn'ont pas changé.

translation.en: Uh, fortunately for me, it did not.
Thank you...
...for your courage, honor, and service.
translation.fr: pour votre honorable courage et votre dévouement.

translation.en: Deal or no deal, Mr. Bridger, you deserve something for what you did.
translation.fr: Accords ou pas, Bridger, vous méritez une récompense.

translation.en: Thank you.
Kid's been beating himself up awful bad the whole trip.
translation.fr: Il a été très dur avec lui-même pendant tout le trajet.

translation.en: We all saw the shape Glass was in.
translation.fr: Glass était mourant, on l'a vu.

translation.en: There was no more to be done. Right?
translation.fr: On ne pouvait rien pour lui,n'est-ce pas ?

translation.en: We all saw him.
WIFE: When there is a storm...
And you stand in front of a tree...
translation.fr: si tu te tiens au pied d'un arbre,

translation.en: If you look at its branches, you swear it will fall.
translation.fr: en regardant ses branches,tu jurerais qu'il va tomber.

translation.en: But if you watch the trunk, you will see its stability.
translation.fr: Mais si tu regardes le tronc,tu vois sa stabilité.

translation.en: SCOUT [IN ARIKARA]: There are traces of a camp...
translation.fr: Il y a les traces d'un campement.

translation.en: Where?
Entering the moon forest.
translation.fr: A l'orée de la forêt de la Lune.

translation.en: Maybe from two days ago. They are moving east.
translation.fr: Il date de deux jours.Ils font route vers l'est.

translation.en: Tell the others.
Let's move quickly. Powaqa could be with them!
translation.fr: Partons vite.Powaqa est peut-être avec eux.

translation.en: [IN ENGLISH] Don't make a sound.
GLASS [IN PAWNEE]: I will get a horse.
POWAQA [IN ARIKARA]: I'll cut off your balls.
GLASS: Come here...
FITZGERALD: May I join you? HENRY: Yes.
translation.fr: Je peux me joindre à vous ?

translation.en: I was wondering when we might be getting paid for that haul.
translation.fr: Je me demandais quandnous serions payés pour le chargement.

translation.en: 'Cause them pelts we collected are still out there, you know...
translation.fr: Les peaux qu'on a collectéessont toujours là-bas, sous un mètre de terre et de neige.

translation.en: ...under a couple foot of dirt and snow. But that ain't my fault.
translation.fr: sous un mètre de terre et de neige. Mais j'y suis pour rien.

translation.en: I'm waiting for Captain Leavenworth to arrive with his army.
translation.fr: J'attends l'arrivée de Leavenworthet de son armée

translation.en: Then we'll have enough men...
...to shoot some civilization into those fucking Arikara and get back our pelts.
translation.fr: aller civiliser les Arikarasà coups de fusil, et récupérer nos peaux.

translation.en: All right. All right.
When's that supposed to happen?
I don't know.
But until then, nobody gets paid.
translation.fr: Mais personne ne sera payé avant.

translation.en: Listen here, all right?
I was hired to trap 'em. I wasn't hired to guard 'em.
translation.fr: On m'a engagé comme trappeur,pas pour garder les peaux.

translation.en: The way I see it, now you, you got a safe.
translation.fr: Il me semble que vous avez un coffre.

translation.en: It's probably full of money.
You signed a contract to protect your boss...
translation.fr: Vous vous êtes engagé à défendre votre employeur et ses biens.

translation.en: ...and your boss's property.
translation.fr: à défendre votre employeur et ses biens.

translation.en: And that safe isn't full anymore. It's short about $300.
translation.fr: Et le coffre a maintenantun trou de 300 $. Un trou ?

translation.en: What the hell is that supposed to mean?
It means, according to my records...
...you purchased more goods on the expedition... ...than what you are owed by the company.
translation.fr: vous avez coûté plus cherque ce que vous doit la compagnie.

translation.en: Now, Happy New Year, Fitzgerald.
GUARD: Fryman! White man at the gate!
translation.fr: Fryman ! Un Blanc demande à entrer !

translation.en: Speak English.
[IN ENGLISH] I have no weapon.
Open her up!
Get the captain!
HENRY: Where are your men?
All dead.
I don't know. Something to eat, please?
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas. J'ai faim.

translation.en: Food comes at a price.
-I have no money. -Then you don't eat.
translation.fr: - J'ai rien.- Alors, tu manges pas. C'est comme ça.

translation.en: Give back some of them stolen pelts you buy from the Injuns.
-Not now, Jones. -Huh?
Silver. How is this? Silver.
translation.fr: Un objet en argent, ça va ?

translation.en: This all you got?
We was nine.
My friend, he die in the snow.
translation.fr: Mon ami est mort dans la neige.

translation.en: And the other was...
...kill by wolf. I see it.
translation.fr: tué par les loups. Sous mes yeux.

translation.en: By wolf, yeah, kill.
Where'd you get this?
Canteen.
He drop it. He kill Toussaint, he drop it--
translation.fr: Il l'a perdue. Il a tué Toussaint, et...

translation.en: -Who? Who? -I don't know. I don't see.
It could be Hawk.
Yeah, could be.
JONES: That half-breed runt couldn't steal no horse.
-Maybe it was Weston. STUBBY BILL: Or Beckett.
How far from here?
Thirty mile.
translation.fr: - C'était loin ?- Environ 10 lieues. Au nord-ouest,près de la rivière Yellowstone.

translation.en: Northwest, near the Yellowstone. The Yellowstone!
translation.fr: Au nord-ouest,près de la rivière Yellowstone.

translation.en: Get the horses saddled. Torches and supplies.
translation.fr: Faites seller les chevaux. Torches et vivres. 10 $ par tête.

translation.en: Ten dollars a man.
Anderson, you stay here.
ANDERSON: Yes, sir. Feed him and watch him.
translation.fr: Oui, capitaine.Je le nourris, et je le surveille.

translation.en: I'll get you a drink.
translation.fr: Je vais te donner à boire.

translation.en: HENRY: When we get to the Yellowstone, we split into two groups!
translation.fr: A la Yellowstone, nous nous séparerons. Oui, capitaine.

translation.en: HENRY: Hawk!
JIM: Hawk, you out there?
HENRY: Keep your guard up!
Eyes in front!
Who are you?
FRYMAN: Beckett? Is that you?
Jesus Christ!
Jesus Christ, what happened?
[IN ENGLISH] Where is he?
HENRY: Jones, take him. Go.
I'm riding ahead. Bill, take Bridger.
translation.fr: Je pars en avant. Bill, emmenez Bridger.

translation.en: Take Bridger!
translation.fr: Emmenez Bridger ! On va te ramener.

translation.en: -Have you seen Fitzgerald? -No, sir.
Get up. Get up!
-You seen Fitzgerald? -No, sir.
Whoa, easy. Where did he go?
-Who? -Fitzgerald. Where did he go?
-I have no idea. -Tell me or I'll take your head off.
translation.fr: - Aucune idée.- Parlez, ou vous mourrez.

translation.en: I swear to God--
Tell me. Tell me!
Texas!
He said he was going to Texas. He said he was gonna reenlist.
translation.fr: C'est ce qu'il a dit. Qu'il allait se rengager.

translation.en: Then he started talking about property. "A decent piece of land."
translation.fr: Qu'il allait acheter"un petit lopin de terre."

translation.en: He's heading for Texas. That's all I know.
translation.fr: Au Texas, c'est tout ce que je sais.

translation.en: Stay here.
Goddamn it!
GUARD: Jones! Get the Captain!
-Fryman! JONES: Open the gate!
HENRY: Get him to the doctor. Now!
You said he was dead! You said he was dead!
translation.fr: Tu as dit qu'il était mort ! - Tu l'as dit !- Je le croyais mort, je le jure !

translation.en: I thought he was, I swear!
translation.fr: - Tu l'as dit !- Je le croyais mort, je le jure !

translation.en: JIM: He lied to me! HENRY: You're a liar.
You left him out there!
translation.fr: Vous l'avez abandonné ! Je l'ai cru !

translation.en: Say the Lord's Prayer.
Say the Lord's Prayer!
Our Father, Who art in heaven. Who art-- I can't!
translation.fr: Notre Père qui es aux cieux.... Qui es... Je ne peux pas !

translation.en: Shut up! Shut up!
From here out, you're a prisoner charged with treason!
translation.fr: - Tu es accusé de haute trahison.- Ne me tuez pas !

translation.en: Take him to the cage! Take him to the cage or you'll hang alongside him!
translation.fr: En cage ! Emmenez-le,ou vous subirez le même sort.

translation.en: I thought he was gonna die!
translation.fr: J'ai pas pu. Je le croyais mourant !

translation.en: Fitz lied to me!
I couldn't help him!
How is he?
DOCTOR: He'll be fine, but there is swelling. He needs to rest.
translation.fr: Ça ira, mais c'est infecté.Il lui faut du repos.

translation.en: I'll be back to check up on him.
GLASS: He ran off, didn't he?
Bridger's telling the truth.
How's that?
Fitzgerald lied to him. He was just following orders.
translation.fr: Fitzgerald lui a menti.Il n'a fait qu'obéir.

translation.en: He wasn't there when Fitzgerald stabbed my boy to death.
translation.fr: Il n'était pas làquand Fitzgerald a tué mon fils.

translation.en: Is that what happened?
He killed Hawk.
I need a horse and gun.
translation.fr: Je veux un cheval et un fusil.

translation.en: No, you need to rest and eat. I'm going after him.
translation.fr: Il vous faut dormir et manger.Je vais le rattraper.

translation.en: You'll never find him without me.
translation.fr: Vous avez besoin de moi pour ça.

translation.en: If we wait till morning he'll get away.
translation.fr: Si j'attends le matin, il s'enfuira.

translation.en: No, he won't.
He's afraid.
He knows how far I came for him.
translation.fr: Il sait ce que j'ai endurépour le rattraper.

translation.en: Same as that elk. When they get afraid, they run deep into the woods.
translation.fr: Il est comme un élan apeuréqui se terre au fond des bois.

translation.en: I got him trapped. He just doesn't know it yet.
translation.fr: Je l'ai piégé. Mais il ne le sait pas.

translation.en: How can you be so sure?
'Cause he has everything to lose.
All I had was that boy.
And he took him from me.
I can't let you go back out there. Not again.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas vous laisser repartir. Pas cette fois.

translation.en: I ain't afraid to die anymore.
translation.fr: Je n'ai plus peur de mourir.

translation.en: I done it already.
I'm going with you.
GLASS: That's his horse, all right.
No way he could've ridden through the night.
translation.fr: Il n'a pas pu chevaucher de nuit.

translation.en: HENRY: How far ahead?
Half a day at the most.
Could be Ree. If they aren't his, we lose him.
translation.fr: Ça peut être un Ari. Dans ce cas, nous le perdons.

translation.en: Unless he reenlisted so he could justify killing again...
translation.fr: A moins qu'il ne se soit rengagépour pouvoir tuer encore,

translation.en: ...these tracks right here are his.
HENRY: I can't remember my wife's face.
translation.fr: Je ne me souviens plusdu visage de ma femme.

translation.en: Last week, she was still with me.
translation.fr: Il y a peu, je la voyais encore.

translation.en: Now she's gone.
I worry I won't recognize her when I get back home.
translation.fr: J'ai peur de ne pas la reconnaîtrequand nous nous reverrons.

translation.en: Is it true you killed an officer?
I just killed the man who was trying to kill my son.
translation.fr: J'ai tué un hommequi voulait tuer mon fils.

translation.en: Smoke.
How close?
No more than a mile up that way.
I'm gonna head up to the west. You go down to the east.
translation.fr: Je pars vers l'ouest,vous prenez vers l'est.

translation.en: See if we can find some tracks.
And if it's the Ree?
translation.fr: Et si ce sont les Aris ?

translation.en: If it's the Ree, you turn right back around... ...and meet me back here. Tsk.
translation.fr: Dans ce cas, tournez brideet retrouvons-nous ici.

translation.en: Now, I wouldn't expect to find a man of your stature...
translation.fr: Je n'attendais pasun homme de votre rang

translation.en: ...so far away from his stove on a morning as cold as this, captain.
translation.fr: si loin de son poêlepar une matinée si froide.

translation.en: You lost?
I'm here to take you back to Fort Kiowa...
translation.fr: Je viens vous ramener à Fort Kiowa,

translation.en: ...where you will be tried for murder.
translation.fr: où vous serez jugé pour meurtre.

translation.en: Is that so?
I ain't crazy about your plan.
Besides, I got one of my own.
We had a deal, Glass!
I tried to tell your boy, all right?
translation.fr: Je l'ai expliqué à ton gamin.

translation.en: I tried to tell him, but he wouldn't listen and he kept on screaming.
translation.fr: Je lui ai expliqué,mais il écoutait pas. Il gueulait, c'est tout.

translation.en: He was gonna get everybody killed.
translation.fr: Il allait tous nous faire tuer.

translation.en: But you and me, we had a deal.
translation.fr: Mais toi et moi, on était d'accord.

translation.en: You know what happened out there.
translation.fr: T'as vu comment ça s'est passé.

translation.en: And on my soul, the Lord, He knows...
translation.fr: Et par mon âme, le Seigneur, Il sait comment ça s'est passé.

translation.en: ...what happened out there.
translation.fr: Il sait comment ça s'est passé.

translation.en: There was no deal.
You killed my boy.
Well, maybe you should've raised a man, instead of some girlie little bitch.
translation.fr: T'aurais dû élever un homme, pas une petite salope.

translation.en: You came all this way just for your revenge, huh?
translation.fr: T'as fait tout ce cheminjuste pour te venger ?

translation.en: Well, you enjoy it, Glass.
'Cause there ain't nothing gonna bring your boy back.
translation.fr: Rien ne te ramènera ton fils.

translation.en: No, it won't.
[IN PAWNEE] Revenge is in God's hands...
...not mine.
